name: The Sixth Prison
description:
You are a resentful alien captive, exchanging hands once again. What do they want from you this time?

Warnings

  • Profanities, trafficking, medical horror

Credits

  • Story - Cryoslight
  • Programming - Cryoslight
  • Menu image - Bernard Hermant at unsplash.com (+ edit by Cryoslight)
  • Character sprite - Cryoslight
  • Background image - Dima Pechurin at unsplash.com (+ edit by Cryoslight)
  • Music - Abelouis at looperman.com
  • Sound effect - Ben Burnes and Maike Watson in their collab Ben vs Maike Sample Pack

This game was made for the O2A2 - Only One of Any Asset visual novel jam. According to the jam rules, The Sixth Prison only contains one of each asset type and is less than 1000 words long.
